<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "RegisterView",
  data() {
    return {};
  },
  methods: {
    register() {
      this.requestLoading = !this.requestLoading;
      axios
        .post("http://192.168.1.110:8000/users/register/", {
          username: this.credentials.username,
          password: this.credentials.password,
        })
        .then((response) => {
          if (response.status == 201) {
            this.requestLoading = !this.requestLoading;
          }
        });
    },
  },
  computed: {
    usernameError() {
      const errors = [];
      if (this.$v.username.length < 5) {
        errors.push(9090);
        return errors;
      }
      return errors;
    },
  },
};
</script>
